people.name: Cholly Atkins
people.description: Charles “Cholly” Atkins  was an American dancer and vaudeville performer, who later became noted as the house choreographer for the various artists on the Motown label.

people.description: The Reverend Dr.  James Edward Cleveland  was a gospel singer, musician, and composer.

people.name: James Hart
people.description: James Stephen Hart  is the former lead singer of the band Burn Halo and was the lead singer and founding member of the rock band Eighteen Visions.

people.name: Casimir Funk
people.description: Kazimierz Funk [kaˈʑimjɛʂ ˈfuŋk] , commonly anglicized as Casimir Funk, was a Polish biochemist, generally credited with being among the first to formulate  the concept of vitamins, which he called "vital amines" or "vitamines".

people.name: Tommy Victor
people.description: Tommy Victor  is the lead singer and guitarist for the heavy metal band Prong that he founded in New York City in 1986.

people.name: Steve Conte
people.description: Steve Conte  is an American musician, songwriter, guitarist, music producer, and lead singer of the band Steve Conte NYC.

people.name: Musiker
people.description: A musician  is a person who plays a musical instrument or is musically talented.
